mapper.sql: id, company_id, pid, tscore, cscore, (tscore+cscore)/2 as sum, gmtCreate, gmtModify, dr,cComment,tComment
mapper.insert: insert into score (id, company_id, pid, tscore, cscore, gmtCreate, gmtModify, dr,cComment,tComment) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dr,jdbcType=BIT},#{cComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{tComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update score
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tscore = #{tscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
cscore = #{cscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gmtCreate = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

dr = #{dr,jdbcType=BIT},
cComment = #{cComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
tComment = #{tComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
